headline: Vistra Q3 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Lag, '25 Guidance Narrowed
summary: Vistra tops Q3 earnings forecasts but misses on revenues, trims 2025 outlook, and continues its aggressive share buybacks.

headline: Vistra Corp. (VST) Is a Trending Stock: Facts to Know Before Betting on It
summary: Vistra (VST) has received quite a bit of attention from Zacks.com users lately. Therefore, it is wise to be aware of the facts that can impact the stock's prospects.
